./VulnDB/RDBO/Source.pm

  • package VulnDB::RDBO::Source
  • EOF
   1 package VulnDB::RDBO::Source;
   2 
   3 use strict;
   4 
   5 use base qw(VulnDB::RDBO);
   6 
   7 __PACKAGE__->meta->setup(
   8     table   => 'source',
   9 
  10     columns => [
  11         id              => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
  12         name            => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 50, not_null => 1 },
  13         email           => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 50, not_null => 1 },
  14         email_password  => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 50, not_null => 1 },
  15         email_server    => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 50, not_null => 1 },
  16         url             => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 100, not_null => 1 },
  17         desc            => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 150, not_null => 1 },
  18         desc_long       => { type => 'scalar', default => '', length => 4294967295, not_null => 1 },
  19         message_type_id => { type => 'integer', default => '', not_null => 1 },
  20     ],
  21 
  22     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
  23 
  24     unique_key => [ 'name', 'message_type_id' ],
  25 
  26     foreign_keys => [
  27         message_type => {
  28             class       => 'VulnDB::RDBO::MessageType',
  29             key_columns => { message_type_id => 'id' },
  30         },
  31     ],
  32 
  33     relationships => [
  34         message => {
  35             class      => 'VulnDB::RDBO::Message',
  36             column_map => { id => 'source_id' },
  37             type       => 'one to many',
  38         },
  39 
  40         userprofiles => {
  41             column_map    => { source_id => 'id' },
  42             foreign_class => 'VulnDB::RDBO::UserProfile',
  43             map_class     => 'VulnDB::RDBO::UserSource',
  44             map_from      => 'source',
  45             map_to        => 'userprofile',
  46             type          => 'many to many',
  47         },
  48     ],
  49 );
  50 
  51 1;
